title: Untitled (for now) 3 or Things I Used to Need
medium: Acrylic on and with found objects
description: The painting components in this series of works are mostly connected to objects related to former needs. This work relates a painting of a clothes iron and a fabricated tool made of Mangle-Iron parts along a delicate line of comprehension – a line like the remaining one connecting us to things we used to need – things that we have almost forgotten.
